reviews.review: The community of this game is pretty neat and the constant release of new add ons helps keep things interesting. It's always fun to hope on if i have time to pass or just want to relax.

I use to play it a lot on console and tried to get back into it awhile back but never could but I started getting back into it again in the last few days and I missed it Im sad to restart but its fine Its fun starting over again sometimes lol I would def recommend this game. It can be fun with friends.

玩得不久，双边红一，谈谈屠夫玩家如何从这个让人血压高的环境中获得乐趣。

如果你觉得屠夫很酷，杀人很爽，准备入手，我建议是不要入手，或者打折三四十块再入。
萌新直接上手屠夫你面临的就是四个全紫技能的人类疯狂玩弄你，折磨你，我甲亢就这么得的。
硬要玩屠夫，就先玩人赚血点给屠夫点技能。单纯找乐子的局，推荐爆米花老杨烧肉联厂，永一白脸烧小图，隐身巴布守尸就完了。就允许人类各种蹲起恶心人，就不让人守尸？不存在的，怎么开心你就怎么玩，不用在意太多。另外也不用追求三杀四杀的，杀一个，你觉得赢了，那就是赢了，心态放平才能找到游戏的真谛。

有条件开黑的，还是多找几个朋友一起玩，快乐翻倍不会高血压。也希望各位人皇给萌新屠夫一点体验，现在日服排一把人类5-10分钟甚至更久，珍惜每一个屠夫，你遛一个少一个。
very fun for both sides with a little practice and sometimes very hard to get bad killers or survivors

This Game is a Very Fun and Addictive Game.

I love and hate this game to the same extend.
I love everything in this Game
What I hate, is where it leads you to the long Run of playing it.

Us, The Gamers. When we like a game we want to learn it and we want to play it for years
We invest time, hours in playing the game to get better in the games we play

Let me explain.

-=When your are new to the game=-
- It's challenging and fun, so you get hook to it.
-  it's scary !
- it's fun and the game reward you for this

-=When you get to understand the game=-
- it still a good game cause you learn that there is a lot more to learn
- Scary is not that Often anymore... But still
- The game still reward you for this

The very deep problem with this game is when you get good OR when you get VERY Good at it.
You will get weird game, very unbalanced games
You will get glitches that makes you loose
You will get ultra competitive Games, when you just want to play a casual game after a hard day of Work.

The reason behind is the better you get the better you gonna get survivors (Skill Base Match Making)
I can tell you that 4 very good survivors against you as a killer. Makes you feel like you are playing in a ESport Event.
AND THE WAY THE GAME IS DESIGNED IS YOU GONNA LOSE AS A KILLER.
While at the begining "You just wanted a casual - After a day of work game" you'll get intense games.
Frustrating, Stressing, Boring game.
Why Frustrating ? Cause i wanted to relax and do mistakes in the match
Why Stressing ? Cause Survivors will see your not good and exploit it.
Why Boring ? Cause you want a casual game and now your in a competitive state of mind and angry. Where a single mistake can lead to the lost of your match.

The match become so tight but ...
- you have to play around rubberband
- Micro-Freeze
- Lags
- Survivor DC'ing
- Weird invisible hitbox that don't even make sense

Because DbD community is one of the best, at the end instead of a "GG WP ALL"
you'll get 
> Pffft EZ
> Bad killer
> Noob Uninstall your game
> Go kill yourself
> ETC...

So this is one of the best game i ever played
At the same time IT IS THE GAME I HATE THE MOST
<<sorry for the ponctuation, english is not my main language>>

Dead by daylight, this crappiest game in my library.

Dead by daylight is so bad, please save the little amount of money you have in your bank account and go buy something more worth your time, such as any other game ever, Yes I know I have 400+ hours on this game, but that's because I was dragged along by my fellow comrades.

PLEASE I cannot stress this enough, this game is so horribly bad I would rather play escape the facility on roblox.com, that game is also trash but not as doo doo as this one.

The goods about this game is you get to play as females, and they're all ugly, sadly the killer still kills me after I show him my goods as my female character, horrible game play if I am being honest.

The bads, everything, everything is so bad on this game, literally I can't say it any other way, this game is shit.

I fucking hate dead by daylight, I cry when my friends ask me to play it, but what else am I gonna do? what other friends do I have? please don't get this game.

I've always liked asymmetric games and this is one of the best. Surprisingly deep. When you see most of the negative reviews coming from people with over 1000 hours of playtime.... yeah, it means the game is good enough that they have spent 1000 hours on it. 

I have spent thousands of hours in Dota, and while I don't enjoy playing it very much any more, It would be disingenuous in the extreme for me to pretend that it's not an amazing game. So take the high hour negative reviews with a grain of salt maybe? I haven't hit 100 hours but it's still a lot of fun playing both survivor and killer, so if you think that's worthwhile bang for your buck, don't look back.

A ideia do jogo eh interessante, vc consegue se divertir bastante jogando com os amigos ou por si msm. é legal saber que tem certas estratégias tanto pra sobrevivente quanto para o assassino que pode ajudar-lhe a vencer a partida rapidamente e é bem gostoso vencer quando o game é pegado. Entretanto, mais pra frente o jogo vai ser a msm sensação, tornando-o meio sem graça. Nesse caso, recomendo procurar formas de se divertir no game se acontecer isso. Ate la, aproveite bastante.

wow this game. impeccable until its not. i love being killer. i love killing my victims. i love being ghostface. wow. stellar character design. did you guys make ghostface on your own? great character. hes my favorite. shit skins though. take a hint from csgo. i love dbd but only ghostface. make better characters like jason and jason bornue. i think i will never play survivor. i dont enjoy it . but if u wanna play a fun game with your friends. i recommend playing killer in a discord where everyone is in their own killer games. this is a certified review by avatar oong.

最高のゲームです。友人とカスタムをやればキャラクターのレベル状況関係なく様々なパーク、アドオン、アイテムを使うことができるため課金せずとも最高のコンディションで挑むことができます。五人でワイワイ楽しくやるならこのゲームは最高です。今から買おうと思っている方はデトバを一緒にプレイできる友人を四人集めることをお勧めします。通常のマッチには長い間焚火を見すぎた影響でチェイス力と煽り性能のカンストした生存者と煽られすぎて生存者全員が親の敵に見えている殺人鬼しかいません。はっきり言ってどちらをプレイしても不快に感じると思われます

survivor just isnt fun plus killers are unbalanced. The game is solely based on how the killer plays so if the killer plays like an A hole you wont have fun. When the game plays as its meant to be though it is very fun but unfortunately it doesnt work that way most of the time.
